title: BUILDINGLINK ANNOUNCES SCIENCE-BASED TARGET COMMITMENT FOR CARBON REDUCTION - PR Newswire
summary: BuildingLink, a property management software company, has announced its commitment to reducing its emissions by 42% by 2030, aligning with the Science-Based Targets initiative. This commitment includes reducing Scope 1 and 2 emissions and measuring and reducing Scope 3 emissions. BuildingLink plans to achieve these targets through initiatives such as using renewable energy certificates and collaborating with suppliers to decrease value chain emissions.
